front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Repair and Rewinding of Motors for the Petroleum and Chemical Industry

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: General recommendations are provided for users of motors that need repair as well as owners and operators of establishments that offer motor repair services. The use of this recommended practice is expected to result in higher quality, more cost-effective, and timely repairs. Guidelines are also provided for evaluating repairs and facilities.
